html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04482023-05-18HC
ActTobacco and Vaping Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Tobacco Products Regulations (Plain and Standardized Appearance)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TOBACCO PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (PLAIN AND STANDARDIZED APPEARANCE) in order to (1) extend the display of health warnings and toxicity information to all tobacco product packages; (2) introduce a rotation scheme for all health-related messages; (3) introduce a mandatory display of health warnings directly on individual cigarettes, little cigars that have a filter, and tubes; (4) allow the use of ‘RS’ or ‘KS’ on cigarette packages as alternatives to ‘regular size’ or ‘king size’; and (5) consolidate all tobacco product labelling and packaging requirements in a single set of regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0097 Publication Date: 2023-06-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Tobacco Products Regulations (Plain and Standardized Appearance)
precis: Regulations Amending the TOBACCO PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (PLAIN AND STANDARDIZED APPEARANCE) in order to (1) extend the display of health warnings and toxicity information to all tobacco product packages; (2) introduce a rotation scheme for all health-related messages; (3) introduce a mandatory display of health warnings directly on individual cigarettes, little cigars that have a filter, and tubes; (4) allow the use of ‘RS’ or ‘KS’ on cigarette packages as alternatives to ‘regular size’ or ‘king size’; and (5) consolidate all tobacco product labelling and packaging requirements in a single set of regulations.
